item.cobblemon_utility_plus_modified.msg: This item is bound to %1$s. You cannot use it!

item.cobblemon_utility_plus_modified.dev: Reverts a Pokémon to its previous evolution

Due to server settings, other balls can't be synchronized to Cherish Ball.
Pokémon must be holding a Poké Ball to sync.
Synchronizes caught Pokémon's Poké Ball to the one it's currently holding. No cost, no return.
